content.value: Hi there, thanks for reaching out to us. I appreciate your patience. üëç I'm really sorry that you were facing a few issues! We do regularly test our online banking through multiple browsers to ensure that it does function correctly. Did an error code or message pop up? Jack
content.html: Hi there, thanks for reaching out to us. I appreciate your patience. üëç I'm really sorry that you were facing a few issues! We do regularly test our online banking through multiple browsers to ensure that it does function correctly. Did an error code or message pop up? Jack
